1. HW News - AMD 5500X3D, Steam OS on ROG Ally, RTX 4070 VRAM Downgrade, AMD Vulnerability  Gamers Nexus
  2. Rumoured new AMD Ryzen 5 5500X3D could be our first sub-$200 3D V-cache gaming CPU  PC Gamer
  3. AMD Ryzen 5 5500X3D listing hints at most affordable 3D V-Cache CPU yet — socket AM4 rides again  Tom's Hardware
  4. AM4-ever: AMD Ryzen 5500X3D CPU shows up in listings  PCWorld
  5. Forget Ryzen 9000, AMD’s next chip might be a Ryzen 5500X3D – and it might just be perfect for a budget gaming PC  TechRadar

item.title: Activision shut down Modern Warfare multiplayer mod H2M to stop it "interfering" with Black Ops 6 sales, says mod maker - Rock Paper Shotgun
item.description:
1. Activision shut down Modern Warfare multiplayer mod H2M to stop it "interfering" with Black Ops 6 sales, says mod maker  Rock Paper Shotgun
  2. Gamers Review-Bomb ‘Modern Warfare Remastered’ On Steam As Activision Kills The Highly-Anticipated H2M ‘Call Of Duty’ Mod  Forbes
  3. Activision shut down viral Call of Duty mod because it "did not want H2M interfering with possible sales of Black Ops 6," says creator  Gamesradar
  4. According to a creator of the ambitious H2M Modern Warfare 2 mod shuttered by Activision, the multi-billion dollar corporation was worried the free project would disrupt Black Ops 6's sales  PC Gamer
  5. Modern Warfare Remaster Mod H2M Gets "Leaked" After Cease & Desist  Insider Gaming

item.title: Your 10-year-old graphics card can run Dragon Age: The Veilguard - Ars Technica
item.description:
1. Your 10-year-old graphics card can run Dragon Age: The Veilguard  Ars Technica
  2. Dragon Age: The Veilguard's Gorgeous Collector's Art Book Is Over 40% Off At Amazon  GameSpot
  3. Hey look, Morrigan’s back in Dragon Age: The Veilguard!  Polygon
  4. It's no wonder Dragon Age: The Veilguard was Steam Deck Verified so quickly⁠: it'll run on a 10-year-old graphics card that was new when Inquisition came out  PC Gamer
  5. Dragon Age: The Veilguard Release Date Set for October  IGN
